column1: 2010/03/26," The ''ROKS Cheonan'', a South Korean Navy ship carrying 104 personnel, sinks off the country's west coast, killing 46. In May, an independent investigation blames North Korea, which denies the allegations.ref name=quotdailynk1quot{{cite web
column3: title=Results Confirm North Korea Sank Cheonan
column12: title=‘All out war’ threatened over North Korea attack on warship Cheonan
